text: @realDonaldTrump Trump must have Coronavirus himself. He wants everyone else to have it. Really? reopen the government knowing we have a huge medical crisis? Other major countries have closed and implementing strategies to aggressively fight COVID-19. Trump Supporters your family can die to!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
